title: Fallout 4 sounds like overhyped trash
body:
https://www.reddit.com/r/gaming/comments/3s4vkh/my_review_of_fallout_4_and_1080p_pc_video/

Great review if anyone's interested.  Btw I didn't mean that the game would be trash.  I just meant that it's probably trash in comparison to what everyone expects it to be.

Such a shame.

Good thing my friend preordered it and we have each other's Xbox Live accounts so we can play each other's games for free and I didn't have to buy this.  I'll prob get bored after a few hours.

This is honestly pathetic:  https://streamable.com/rveo
